revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Rabuta |image = [[File:Rabuta.png]] |caption = Even though it is bitter, it should be eaten peel and all. The hair on the peel cleans the stomach from the inside. |growtime = 3h 24m 0s |harvest = 28 berries |replant = 10% |points = 600 |flavor = {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 20 {{!}} 10 }} '''Rabuta''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an [[Aspear]] with at least 1 [[Aguav]]. The [[Aspear]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Harvest Stages durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-430s || 430-1400s || 1400-4000s || 4000-8640s || 8640-17280s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:RabutaTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:RabutaTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:RabutaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Rabuta berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
